basic.team-full: 該團隊目前已滿或不平衡。 選擇另一個團隊!

announcements.announce1: 你可以加入 discord 尋求幫助, cool perks and memes! https://cosmicv.net/koth
announcements.announce2: Have a problem with a player on our server? Use /report {id} {reason} for staff to review!
announcements.announce3: Interested in supporting the community development? Look at our store: https://store.cosmicv.net
announcements.announce4: VIPs and MVPs are able to cusomize their weapon skins and more! https://store.cosmicv.net
announcements.announce5: VIP+ users can customise their join/leave messages from the server! https://store.comsicv.net

cosmetics.no-permission-hat: 你沒有使用帽子的權限!
cosmetics.hat-doesnt-exist: 沒有這個名稱的帽子存在!
cosmetics.tag-doesnt-exist: That is not a valid tag! Use (snowflake/rainbow/candy/red/dark_red/light_blue/blue/dark_blue/green/neon_green/dark_green/orange/purple/gray/gold/pink/dark_pink/brown/yellow)
cosmetics.tag-applied: Chat tag successfully applied to your player!

chat-messages.chat-messages-immediate-server-restart: 已安排伺服器立即重啟，保存玩家資料並重啟.
chat-messages.chat-messages-server-restart-after-game: 已安排本場比賽後重啟伺服器.

chat-messages.chat-messages-too-fast: 你不能這麼快地發送訊息.
chat-messages.chat-messages-too-many-reports: We appreciate you wanting to help, but please slow down with your reports!
chat-messages.chat-messages-invalid-player: 無效的玩家ID，不存在該ID對應的玩家.
chat-messages.chat-messages-no-permission: You do not have the rank required to use this command!
chat-messages.chat-messages-nickname-too-long: 這個昵稱太長! 至少下20個以下.

prestige.not-100: You need to be level 100+ to prestige!
prestige.need-10k: You need at least $10,000 to prestige.

shops.shop-buy-parachute: 你已經得到了降落傘。 準備跳!
shops.shop-rent-vehicle-max-limit: 無法租用車輛，已達到團隊限制.
shops.shop-error-low-funds: 你沒有足夠的錢購買這個武器 %s! 你需要 $%s

shops.shop-error-low-rank: You need to be %s to purchase this.
shops.shop-error-low-prestige: You're not a high enough prestige for that! You need to be prestige %s

squad.squad-cant-promote-out-of-squad: 你不能提拔不在你隊伍中的人！

squad.squad-disbanded: 小隊已解散，你已被移除！
squad.squad-already-in: 你已經在一個小隊中了！

squad.squad-promote-success: 成功將 %s 提升為小隊隊長。

squad.squad-not-leader: 你不是這個小隊的隊長！

squad.squad-settag-success: Squad tag has been set to [%s]

squad.squad-wrong-team: This squad is on the %s team, please switch teams to join this squad.
squad.squad-kicked-you: You were removed from the squad by the leader.

boosters.no-multiple-boosters-money: You can not have multiple Money boosters active at any time!

boosters.activated-money: You have just activated a 2x Money booster!

boosters.money-booster-amount: You have %s Money Booster(s) ready to be enabled use: /boosters money

1v1.1v1-pending-invite: You already have a pending 1v1 invite!
1v1.1v1-no-self: You can not start a 1v1 with yourself!
1v1.1v1-new-invite-wager: %s has just invited you to a 1v1, you will use their current loadout with a wager of $%s! Type "/1v1 %s" to begin, this offer expires in 60s!
1v1.1v1-sent-invite-wager: You just invited %s to a 1v1 battle, you will use your current loadout to fight in the arena! The winner will recieve the wager of $%s from the losing player!
1v1.1v1-new-invite: %s has just invited you to a 1v1, you will use their current loadout! Type "/1v1 %s" to begin, this offer expires in 60s!
1v1.1v1-sent-invite: You just invited %s to a 1v1 battle, you will use your current loadout to fight in the arena!
1v1.1v1-no-pending-invite: You do not have a pending 1v1 invite!
1v1.1v1-in-battle: This player is already in a 1v1 battle!
1v1.1v1-in-spawn: You must be in your team spawn to start a duel!
1v1.1v1-same-team: You can not 1v1 someone on your team!
1v1.1v1-cancelled-spawn: The 1v1 has been cancelled because a participant has left their spawn zone!
1v1.1v1-winner-msg: %s has just won in a 1v1 battle against %s!
1v1.1v1-no-perms-wager: You must be a VIP or MVP to place a wager!
1v1.1v1-vip-low-wager: VIP can only place wagers up to $500
1v1.1v1-wager-1000: You can not place a wager greater than $1000
1v1.1v1-wager-win: You took $%s from %s for winning your 1v1!
1v1.1v1-wager-loss: You lost $%s to %s in your latest 1v1!
1v1.1v1-target-broke: Your opponent can not afford that wager!
1v1.1v1-cant-afford: You can not afford that wager!
1v1.1v1-on-cooldown: You or your apponent is on a cooldown for 1v1's!
